item.title: About Us
item.description: Overview Established by Kankanala Niveditha reddy, founder of NSR foundation to support various Philanthropic activities in Nagarjunsagar area of Nalgonda District in Telangana State. Key areas of interest are Basic Education Impartment, Agriculture and water resources, Health & Nutrition, Livelihood promotion in rural communities. Although more extensive & profound work has begun lately in Oct 2019 the Foundation was registered and started working on various aspects in rural empowerment from XXX month & 2017.

item.title: Contact
item.description: You can get in touch at the addresses and telephone numbers mentioned or fill in the contact form.

item.title: Our Work
item.description: Portfolios Health & Nutrition Education Livelihood, Skill development & Financial Inclusion Environment Agriculture and Water resources Basic Infrastructure Women Empowerment
